backend/main.mo: Defines user profiles, access control, posts, and comments with validation, suspension checks, and creation logic, integrating storage and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence mapping share functionality features to frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten one‑sentence summaries for key frontend files including hooks, moderation utilities, pages, and components.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes with color tokens for UI components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, app icons, manifest link, and mounting the React root.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: Web app manifest configuring PWA metadata such as name, colors, start URL, orientation, and icons.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling authentication, username setup, loading states, and navigation between app pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Renders the login page with branding and Internet Identity sign‑in button including loading state.
frontend/src/components/feed/CommentsThr: Displays and manages comments for a post with validation, suspension checks, liking, and comment submission.
frontend/src/components/feed/DeletePostD: Confirmation dialog for deleting a post, calling the delete mutation and showing success or error toasts.
frontend/src/components/feed/PostCard.ts: Displays a post with author info, content, image, like button, comment thread, and reporting or delete actions.
Provides the main app layout with header, unread notifications badge, content container, and bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/nav/BottomNav.ts: Renders bottom navigation buttons for switching between main app pages.
frontend/src/components/polls/WeeklyPoll: Shows weekly poll status, voting UI, or results depending on poll state.
frontend/src/components/profile/Username: Modal for validating and submitting a unique username on first setup.
frontend/src/components/reporting/Report: Dialog to confirm and submit a report against a user account.
Dialog to confirm and submit a report against a post and trigger local notifications.
frontend/src/constants/uploads.ts: Defines allowed image MIME types and a 5MB upload size limit.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status flags. Includes helper functions for creating AuthClient instances with custom options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, posts, comments, and likes through an actor. Automatically handles query enabling, cache invalidation, and polling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSuspensionStatus.t: Checks the caller’s profile to determine if the account is suspended and returns suspension status and end time. Compares suspension timestamp to the current time in nanoseconds.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, CSS variables for light and dark themes, layout rules, and utility classes. Sets color tokens and prevents horizontal scrolling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it in InternetIdentityProvider and React Query’s QueryClientProvider. Loads global CSS and renders the root component.
Defines a normalized list of disallowed terms and utilities to normalize and detect inappropriate text. Supports basic leetspeak normalization and substring checks.
frontend/src/moderation/validateTextCont: Validates post text by ensuring it is non-empty and free of disallowed terms. Returns a validity flag and optional error message.
frontend/src/moderation/validateUsername: Validates usernames for length, allowed characters, and disallowed terms. Returns a validity result with optional error message.
frontend/src/notifications/localNotifica: Manages localStorage-backed notifications per principal, including retrieval, creation, marking as read, and unread counts. Sorts notifications by timestamp.
frontend/src/notifications/notificationT: Defines notification types and the Notification interface used throughout the app. Includes fields for id, type, message, timestamp, and read state.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Provides a UI for creating posts with text and optional images, including validation, upload progress, and suspension checks. Submits posts via mutation and shows success or error feedback.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Displays the main feed of posts with refresh support and a weekly poll panel. Shows loading states and maps posts to PostCard components.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Renders a notifications list for the logged‑in user, with icons, timestamps, and read-status handling via local notification storage.
frontend/src/pages/PollsPage.tsx: Displays the weekly poll page and renders the WeeklyPollPanel component.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows user profile info, suspension status, sharing options, and logout functionality using various hooks and utilities.
frontend/src/polls/extractWeeklyTopics.t: Extracts top weekly topics by normalizing text from posts/comments, counting word frequency, and returning the top 10 with fallbacks.
frontend/src/polls/localPollStore.ts: Manages per-user weekly poll data in localStorage, including creation, retrieval, week rollover cleanup, and vote submission.
frontend/src/polls/pollTimeWindow.ts: Defines time‑based rules for poll availability, voting windows, and week identification.
frontend/src/polls/useWeeklyPoll.ts: React hook that initializes weekly polls, tracks voting state, handles vote submission, and generates poll topics from posts.
frontend/src/utils/imageFileValidation.t: Validates uploaded image files by checking allowed MIME types and maximum file size.
frontend/src/utils/shareHornetHive.ts: Implements sharing logic using Web Share API with clipboard and legacy fallbacks, plus helpers for copy and capability detection.
frontend/src/utils/timeFormat.ts: Formats timestamps into relative or human‑readable strings, including suspension end date formatting.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters (query or hash), persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from storage or the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and loading several plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app goals, architecture notes, existing features, and versioned state for the Hornet Hive build plan.
